Compatible with iOS 8, 9, 10 and 11.

A Mobile Substrate tweak that replaces the default Power Off menu with a simple alert menu that has additional options including reboot, enter safe mode and respring as well as the default power off option.

Has been well tested on iOS 10 iPhone 6+ and should work from iOS 8 - 12. No system files are modified and so any problems can easily be solved by removing the tweak in Substrate Safe Mode or No Substrate mode.

Any requests or bug reports can be sent to: simplepowerdown@multichip.london

Enjoy the tweak!

Configure options from Settings.
